author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Communication & Outreach
description: Uma participação significativa requer uma comunidade informada e engajada, porém o fluxo de informações do Projeto Catalisador é desorganizado.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem statement is clear and suitable to the given challenge, however, for better understanding, it should be explained more in detail (ex: What is the argument to support the problem statement of "Project Catalyst's information flow is disorganized" ?).
The solution is clearly defined, fit to the challenge (with a clear roadmap, future funding, risks, and mitigation analysis,...), as a result, I can see the clear expected impact to the ecosystem in short term and long term. Therefore, I strongly agree with this proposal's impact and rate the impact of this proposal with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q1:
This team is quite clearly described, with suitable skills, experiences for implementation; The leader is an active member of Catalyst with several ideas contributed. However, some other team's position is not defined (including: Web Developer and Community/Social Media Lead). There is no information of demo/pilot is provided. The proposal's budget is clearly defined with items structure and explanations, especially the of calculation base and the budget of "Algorithmic DAO Smart Contract". Risks are provided with mitigation analysis. For a better understanding of this proposal's feasibility, my advice is: (1) Fulfilling the team description (Web Developer and Community/Social Media Lead) because these members are important to the proposal of communication and outreach; (2) It would be great if the KPIs are attached to the Roadmap, because the reader wants to know when and where your KPIs would be.
Therefore, I am neutral with this proposal's feasibility. Based on the given information, I can rate the feasibility of this proposal with a score of 3.
f6_assessments.q2:
There is a lot of information provided.
This team description is quite clear with documents and links for verification, however, some team's position is not defined (including: Web Developer and Community/Social Media Lead). The proposal's budget is clearly defined with items structure and explanations, especially the calculation base and the budget of "Algorithmic DAO Smart Contract". Risks are provided with mitigation analysis. 
For a better audibility of this proposal, my advice is: (1) Fulfilling the team description (Web Developer and Community/Social Media Lead) because these members are important to the proposal of communication and outreach; (2) Integration of KPIs to the Roadmap with the defined numbers, this would help the community easier to track the implementation of this proposal is funded.
Therefore, based on the given information, I agree with this proposal's auditability, and rate the auditability of this proposal a score of 4.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is an excellent idea. The proposal has clearly identified the problem from the challenge that is to be solved. The proposal if implemented will benefit Cardano since it aims to create a Decentralized Autonomous Organization and to facilitate communication and participation amongst Cardano community members. The goals of the proposal are in congruence with the challenge settings and that for me is superb.
f6_assessments.q1: From the relevant experience section, the team is undoubtedly skilled and experienced with a link provided. I like the fact that the team members are known. The budget also is well presented. I can also see a detailed plan for the successful implementation of the proposal. I appreciate the fact that the proposers have taken into consideration risks/challenges involved in the implementation and have gone ahead with steps to tackle those challenges. With all these relevant information, successfully implementation would be assured.
f6_assessments.q2: It is good that the proposer has outlined the roadmap, milestones and time horizon for the achievement of the proposal. Also I can see key metrics/KPIs for the success of the proposal. The proposal has given an understandable description of the targeted problem and geared towards tackling it. This makes the proposal easy to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: The idea is great however, I think it should consider a different challenge and add a bit of diversity in terms of language to facilitate communication and participation. I like the voting component as well.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has great experience to execute the deliverables of the project. The outcomes are specific and would solve governance issues within the community. It would be great to focus the project on a particular region and outline how to expand after the first success.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is well detailed with a breakdown of activities for easy auditing. In all, the proposal is transparent and open.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a great idea put up by the proposer. The proposal partly address the challenge in the sense that it should have been in the challenges that focus on the creation of dapps.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal is likely to be executed because the proposer provided relevant links of team members with great experiences capable of implementing the proposal successfully. The budget is on point.
f6_assessments.q2: Great work done by the proposer in outlining the detailed road map and metrics on project execution. The proposer has also started the key performance indicators,definition of success when the project is implemented.

solution: Criar um DAO, com financiamento sustentado, para facilitar a comunicação e participação entre a comunidade, DAOs, projetos e equipes.
experience: Uma equipe experiente de desenvolvedores Blockchain, pioneiros de Plutus, operadores de SPO, Conselheiros Comunitários e Analistas de Soluções.
